SELECT p.publisher_id as id, p.publisher_name FROM PUBLISHER p
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKTBL(book_id, title, writer, price, sale_price, created_date_time, last_modif_date_time,category_category_id,publisher_publisher_id) VALUES(book_seq.nextval,#{title},#{writer},#{price},#{salePrice},current_timestamp,current_timestamp,#{categoryName},#{publisherName})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM booktbl b WHERE b.book_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select b.book_id as id, b.title, b.writer, b.price, b.sale_price, b.created_date_time, p.publisher_id, p.publisher_name, c.category_id, c.category_name from booktbl b JOIN PUBLISHER p ON b.PUBLISHER_PUBLISHER_ID = p.PUBLISHER_ID JOIN CATEGORYTBL c ON b.CATEGORY_CATEGORY_ID = c.CATEGORY_ID where b.book_id = #{id}

SELECT t.book_id as id, t.title, t.writer, t.publisher_id, t.publisher_name, t.category_id, t.category_name FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, b1.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM BOOKTBL b JOIN PUBLISHER p ON b.PUBLISHER_PUBLISHER_ID = p.PUBLISHER_ID JOIN CATEGORYTBL c ON b.CATEGORY_CATEGORY_ID = c.CATEGORY_ID WHERE b.BOOK_ID > 0 ORDER BY b.BOOK_ID DESC) b1 WHERE
rownum <= (#{page} * #{size})) t WHERE rn > (#{page}-1)*#{size}
SELECT count(*) FROM booktbl b JOIN PUBLISHER p ON b.PUBLISHER_PUBLISHER_ID = p.PUBLISHER_ID JOIN CATEGORYTBL c ON b.CATEGORY_CATEGORY_ID = c.CATEGORY_ID WHERE book_id > 0
